title: Hey Riot. I have AMD new computer. can get past Champion select
body: I got a brand New Cyber Power Desk yesterday. i bought it just for league. i have a AMD Driver. the one time i got it to work past the champion select when i joined the game i was like 2 fps but i could move ashe in the tutorial. this only worked when i disabled my readeon graphics card. Please help me I dont know what to do anymore.

replies.body:
Gluck has got some pretty good suggestions there! 

If that doesn't seem to be helping, make sure to go through the other steps listed in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well. Hit me back up if none of that is working!

1. Make sure your monitor cable is plugged into your AMD card, and not your motherboard
2. Install AMD's auto-detect tool which will automatically find and install the best driver for your card from http://support.amd.com/en-us/download/auto-detect-tool
3. Run Windows update

If the above don't work it sounds like a potential graphics card issue. Check if you are having graphics issues with other games or applications & contact AMD support if this is the case at http://support.amd.com/en-us or alternatively either Cyberpower support or the support team from the GPU vendor (e.g. XFX, MSI, Sapphire...)

I am assuming this is a copy of League of Legends which you freshly installed on this system. If it was copied over onto your new system from another, rather than newly installed, then that could cause issues, not least because LoL installs prerequisite software with itself, as well as registry information on an Operating System.
